title: Herb Lubalin - Address Stationery - serif with swashes - FONT ID
content:
Looking for the font used as a basis for this beautiful custom illustration Lubalin created for his stationery system. Anybody have suggestions for fonts that could be used as a base for creating a custom illustration similar to this?

Many thanks for any help in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6160602a7bfe5227f71e0a40d69237ea_6721.jpg)

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Vast number of swashes in Mark Simonson's Bookmania [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012553/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/")  
Don
